fields.name: Rolex Submariner Date
fields.description: The quintessential divers' watch, featuring a Cerachrom bezel and Oyster bracelet.

fields.name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak
fields.description: The octagonal bezel with hexagonal screws and the 'Tapisserie' dial make this an icon.

fields.name: Patek Philippe Nautilus 5711
fields.description: The most sought-after luxury sports watch in the world, featuring a gradient blue dial.

fields.name: Rolex Daytona 'Panda'
fields.description: The legendary cosmograph with a white dial and black ceramic tachymeter bezel.

fields.name: Vacheron Constantin Overseas
fields.description: A refined sports watch with a stunning blue dial and Maltese cross-inspired bracelet.

fields.name: Richard Mille RM 11-03
fields.description: A masterpiece of engineering, featuring a flyback chronograph and carbon TPT case.

fields.name: Rolex GMT-Master II 'Pepsi'
fields.description: Iconic red and blue ceramic bezel paired with a Jubilee bracelet.

fields.name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore
fields.description: A bolder, more rugged take on the classic Royal Oak with chronograph functions.

fields.name: Rolex Day-Date 40 'President'
fields.description: Crafted in 18ct yellow gold with the iconic President bracelet and fluted bezel.

fields.name: Patek Philippe Aquanaut
fields.description: The modern sports watch with a composite tropical strap and embossed dial.

fields.name: Rolex Sky-Dweller Blue
fields.description: The most complex Rolex movement, featuring an annual calendar and dual time zone.

fields.name: A. Lange & Söhne Lange 1
fields.description: German perfection featuring an off-center dial and a massive outsize date.

fields.name: Cartier Santos Dumont
fields.description: The first true pilot's watch, featuring an elegant square case and exposed screws.

fields.name: Richard Mille RM 35-02 Rafael Nadal
fields.description: Ultra-lightweight watch designed to withstand extreme shocks on the tennis court.

fields.name: Omega Speedmaster 'Moonwatch'
fields.description: The first watch worn on the moon, featuring the Hesalite crystal and Calibre 3861.
